metadata.title: CVE-2012-1191 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The resolver in dnscache in Daniel J. Bernstein djbdns 1.05 overwritescached server names and TTL values in NS records during the processing of aresponse to an A record query, which allows remote attackers to triggercontinued resolvability of revoked domain names via a "ghost domain names"attack.

criterions.comment: djbdns package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
